video_data.title: React Course - Beginner's Tutorial for React JavaScript Library [2022]
video_data.description: Learn React by building eight real-world projects and solving 140+ coding challenges. This comprehensive course teaches React from the ground up through practical projects including business card generator, travel journal, meme generator, notes app, Tenzies dice game, and quizzical trivia app. The course covers React Basics & JSX, Data-driven React, React State, Conditional Rendering, Forms, Side Effects, React Router, React Context, and Advanced React patterns.
